thread.section_title: Finance & Economy – News from shipping finance, major banks and the world economy
thread.title: COSCO Receives Fleet Renewal Subsidy

author: shippingherald.com
title: COSCO Receives Fleet Renewal Subsidy
text:
China COSCO Holdings Co Ltd says it has received ship scrapping subsidies for about 3.96 billion yuan ($638.71 million) through China Ocean Shipping, the controlling shareholder of the company, for the decommissioning and upgrading of vessels.
“The subsidy was recognized as non-operating income and will be included in the profit and loss of the company for the year ending 31 December 2015 to compensate the losses suffered by the company due to the advanced disassembling of the vessels,” Cosco said in a stock exchange filing.
The subsidies were received by Cosco on 30 June 2015.
